title: No train service between Tanah Merah and Changi Airport

title_translations.zh-Hans: 丹那美拉与樟宜机场之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara Tanah Merah dan Lapangan Terbang Changi
title_translations.ta: தானா மேரா மற்றும் சாங்கி விமான நிலையத்திற்கு இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: Trains service has resumed between Tanah Merah and Changi Airport. Free bus service is still available.
Please estimate additional 20mins traveling time between Tanah Merah and Changi Airport on both bounds due to track fault.
There is no train service between Tanah Merah and Changi Airport in both directions due to track falult. Free bus service is available.
